name: Hardpacked Snowball
rules: Attach to target hero or ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached character can't attack or protect and has [Exhaust] -> Attach Hardpacked Snowball to target hero or ally and exhaust it.

name: PX-238 Winter Wondervolt
rules: Choose an ally type.; Ongoing: All allies also have that type. (Examples of types are Chicken, Demon, Druid, Gnome, and Yeti.)

name: Greatfather Winter
rules: 0 -> Put a card from your hand into target player's hand. Use only once per turn. (He owns that card for the rest of the game.)
flavour: You're quite the helper to ol' Greatfather Winter.

name: Great-father Winter
rules: 0 -> Target player gains control of target ability, ally, or equipment you control. Use only once per turn.

name: Metzen the Reindeer
rules: Elusive; When Metzen enters play, target opponent puts three Pirate ally tokens with 1 ATK / 1 health into play.; [Exhaust] -> Ready target hero or ally. Use only if no Pirates are in play.

name: The Abominable Greench
rules: If an opponent would draw a card, you draw one instead.

name: Gingerbread Cookie
rules: Destroy Gingerbread Cookie -> Each hero heals 7 damage from itself.

name: Mistletoe
rules: You and another friendly player each exhaust your heroes -> You and that player each draw a card.

name: The Reason for the Season
rules: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. If it's December, draw another card.

name: Treats for Great-father Winter
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. Then, you may discard a Gingerbread Cookie card. If you do, search your deck for a Feast of Winter Veil card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
flavour: Here's a little something…you know, for the effort. - Great-father Winter

name: The Reason for the Season
rules: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. If it's December, draw another card.
